page.title: 02Village Shop
page.content: The owner has been running the shop for nine years.When she started the shop there was only the post office.She says it is very nice running the shop and she enjoys this type of work.The name of the shop is Ye Olde Paper Shoppe."I chose the name because I thought it went in character with the shop.The building is 200 years old but has been renovated,"she said."A shop in the village is different to a town shop because people just pop in for a chat."Some of the problems of running a shop she finds are late papers,short stock, awkward customers,shoplifting and paper boys and girls not turning up. The most popular items she sells are sweets,cigarettes and newspapers.The owner thinks that the prices in her shop are about average.The shop is open seven days a week.
